edu.frontrange.csc240.a8

Class ViewSelectionPanel

  • Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.frontrange.csc240.a8.ViewSelectionPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ViewSelectionPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The ViewSelectionPanel has three components: a label at the top left, a panel containing the selection method for the scale, one for each temperature system, and a text field, for inputting or displaying the numeric value of the temperature.
    Version:
    2.0, 2016-10-15, Assignment 8, Exercise 12.13
    Author:
    Dr. Bruce K. Haddon, Instructor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
